mapper.select: SELECT thu.u_id, nickname, t.name, auth, thu.t_id FROM user AS u JOIN team_has_user AS thu ON u.id=thu.u_id JOIN team AS t ON t.id=thu.t_id WHERE thu.t_id IN ( SELECT t_id FROM team_has_user WHERE u_id= #{userId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_has_user(t_id, auth, u_id) VALUES (#{teamId},#{auth},#{userId});
